<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" media="all" href="/portal/4/css/library__theme.css">
<style type="text/css">
/* ==========================================================================
   LIBRARY THEME (Version: 23.3)
   --------------------------------------------------------------------------
   * ELEMENTS
      : Actions
      : Fields
      : Thumbnails
         : FileField

   * COMPONENTS
      : Expired session

   * MODULES
      : Banner

   * PAGETYPES
      : Blocking login
   ========================================================================== */

/* ELEMENTS: Actions
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --action--icon--remove: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove.svg);
    --action--icon--remove--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--add: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--add.svg);
    --action--icon--add--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--add--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--delete: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove.svg);
    --action--icon--delete--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--remove--hover.svg);
    --action--icon--edit: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--edit.svg);
    --action--icon--edit--hover: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--edit--hover.svg);
}

/* ELEMENTS: Fields
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --fields--icon--caret--down: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--down--selected: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down--selected.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--down--disabled: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--down--disabled.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--up: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--up.svg);
    --fields--icon--caret--up--selected: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--caret--up--selected.svg);
    --fields--icon--clear: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--clear.svg);
}

/* ELEMENTS: Thumbnails: FileField
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

.FileField {
    --thumbnail--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/icon--user.svg);
}

/* COMPONENTS: Expired session
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --session--icon--closethick: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/close.svg);
}

/* MODULES: Banner
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --banner--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/_cms/4/image/bannerMainDesktop?version=331769);
}

/* Media query to target only mobile */
@media all and (max-width:750px) {
    :root {
        --banner--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/_cms/4/image/bannerMainMobile?version=331770);
    }

}

/* PAGETYPES: Blockin login
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--desktop.webp);
}

/* Media query to target only tablet */
@media all and (min-width:751px) and (max-width:1024px) {
    :root {
        --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--tablet.webp);
    }

}

/* Media query to target only mobile */
@media all and (max-width:750px) {
    :root {
        --login__body--background--image: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/login--bg--mobile.jpg);
    }

}

/* OTHERS: New Images
   -------------------------------------------------------------------------- */

:root {
    --menu--arrow--down: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/arrow-down.svg);
}

:root {
    --arrow--left: url(https://bloomberg.avature.net/portal/4/images/arrow-left.svg);
}

</style><link type="text/css" media="all" rel="stylesheet" id="corecss" href="https://templates-static-assets.avacdn.net/cssLibrary/23.3/core.min.css">

j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=

    <script type="text/javascript">        ServiceFactory.getEventManager().attachToLoadEvent(function(){
            CookieConsentPopupService.getInstance().initialise({"content":{"description":"Your choice regarding cookies on this website: This website uses cookies, beacons, invisible tags, and similar technologies (collectively \"cookies\") in order to function and to understand how users engage with us. You must enable cookies to use this site."},"styles":{"background":"#000","color":"#fff","fontFamily":"AvenirNextPForBBG, Helvetica, sans-serif","highlight":"#FFFFFF","lowlight":"#000000"},"showOnTop":false,"hideRejectButton":false,"hideAcceptButton":false,"initialNonEssentialCookieState":false,"openPopupForRejectedCookies":false,"oneCol":false,"showExpanded":false,"transition":0.1});

                                                        const cookieBannerParams = {"content":{"description":"Your choice regarding cookies on this website: This website uses cookies, beacons, invisible tags, and similar technologies (collectively \"cookies\") in order to function and to understand how users engage with us. More information on the types of cookies we use can be found by clicking on \"Cookie Preferences\". For more information relating to how we use your personal data, please see our \u003Ca class=\"link--cookies\" href=\"https:\/\/www.bloomberg.com\/notices\/careers-privacy\/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\"\u003Eprivacy policy\u003C\/a\u003E.","acceptAll":"Accept All","rejectAll":"Reject All","save":"Save and Close","cancel":"Cancel","settings":"Cookie Preferences","cookiesDisabled":"Error: Cookies are blocked or not supported by your browser. You must enable cookies to use this site."},"styles":{"background":"#000","color":"#fff","fontFamily":"AvenirNextPForBBG, Helvetica, sans-serif","highlight":"#FFFFFF","lowlight":"#000000"},"showOnTop":false,"hideRejectButton":false,"hideAcceptButton":false,"initialNonEssentialCookieState":false,"openPopupForRejectedCookies":false,"oneCol":false,"showExpanded":false,"transition":0.1};
                cookieBannerParams.forceOpen = true;
                cookieBannerParams.showExpanded = true;

                                const cookieBannerDisplayBtn = document.querySelector(".cookieBannerOpenButton");
                if (cookieBannerDisplayBtn) {
                    const cookieBanner = document.querySelector(".cookies");
                    cookieBannerDisplayBtn.addEventListener('click', e => {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        if (!cookieBanner) CookieConsentPopupService.getInstance().initialise(cookieBannerParams);
                    })
                    cookieBannerDisplayBtn.classList.remove("link--loading");
                }
                    });
    </script>

    <div class="cookies " style="transition: opacity 0.1s;"><div class="cookies__wrapper"><div class="cookies__content clearfix"><div class="cookies__info"><div class="cookies__info__copy"><p>Your choice regarding cookies on this website: This website uses cookies, beacons, invisible tags, and similar technologies (collectively "cookies") in order to function and to understand how users engage with us. For more information relating to how we use your personal data, please see our <a class="link--cookies" target="_blank" href="https://www.bloomberg.com/notices/careers-privacy/" rel="noopener noreferrer">privacy policy</a>.</p></div><div class="cookies__info__buttons"><a role="button" href="#" class="cookiesButton cookiesButtonAccept">Accept All</a><a class="cookiesButton cookiesButtonReject" role="button" href="#">Reject All</a><a class="cookiesButton cookiesButtonSettings cookiesButtonSettingsIcon" role="button" href="#"><i class="avaicon-icon-settings" aria-hidden="true"></i><span>Cookie Preferences</span></a><a class="cookiesButton cookiesButtonSettings cookiesButtonSettingsText" href="#" role="button">Cookie Preferences</a></div></div><div class="cookies__settings"><div class="cookies__settings__content"><div class="cookies__settings__option" tabindex="1"><div class="cookies__settings__option__title" for="cookie-option-1"><h6 id="cookieLabel1">Essential</h6></div><div class="cookies__settings__option__description"><p id="cookie-description-1">These cookies are essential for our website to function properly.
These cookies enable the basic functionalities of the website to function and ensure the security features of the website. We have to keep these cookies enabled as we cannot provide you with the website without these cookies. Essential cookies include: Session cookie, Language cookie, Token field for CSRF, and Cookie consent preferences.</p></div></div><div tabindex="3" class="cookies__settings__option"><div for="cookie-option-3" class="cookies__settings__option__title"><label class="cookies__settings__option__switch" tabindex="3"><input type="checkbox" id="cookie-option-3" tabindex="0" aria-describedby="cookie-description-3" aria-labelledby="cookieLabel3" data-id="3"><span class="cookies__settings__option__slider round"></span><span class="visibility--hidden--visually">Performance</span></label><h6 id="cookieLabel3">Performance</h6></div><div class="cookies__settings__option__description"><p id="cookie-description-3">These cookies allow us to understand and analyse the performance of the website to deliver a better experience to our users. Among other features, these cookies help us count the number of visits and/or track user activity to measure and improve performance.
Performance cookies include <a target="_blank" href="https://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout">Google Analytics</a>, 
<a target="_blank" href="https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-US/privacystatement">Microsoft Clarity</a> and
<a target="_blank" href="https://www.optimizely.com/trust-center/privacy/"> Optimizely</a>.</p></div></div></div><div class="cookies__settings__content"><div class="cookies__settings__option" tabindex="2"><div for="cookie-option-2" class="cookies__settings__option__title"><label tabindex="2" class="cookies__settings__option__switch"><input data-id="2" aria-labelledby="cookieLabel2" type="checkbox" tabindex="0" aria-describedby="cookie-description-2" id="cookie-option-2"><span class="cookies__settings__option__slider round"></span><span class="visibility--hidden--visually">Functional</span></label><h6 id="cookieLabel2">Functional</h6></div><div class="cookies__settings__option__description"><p id="cookie-description-2">These cookies enhance or add functionalities to the website (e.g. add fonts or live chats, embed videos). If rejected, some or all of the websiteâ€™s functionalities may not function properly or as intended. Functional cookies include <a href="https://www.icims.com/legal/privacy-notice-website/" target="_blank">iCIMS</a>.</p></div></div><div tabindex="4" class="cookies__settings__option"><div class="cookies__settings__option__title" for="cookie-option-4"><label class="cookies__settings__option__switch" tabindex="4"><input type="checkbox" aria-describedby="cookie-description-4" data-id="4" id="cookie-option-4" tabindex="0" aria-labelledby="cookieLabel4"><span class="cookies__settings__option__slider round"></span><span class="visibility--hidden--visually">Advertising</span></label><h6 id="cookieLabel4">Advertising</h6></div><div class="cookies__settings__option__description"><p id="cookie-description-4">These cookies are used by the following advertising companies: <a href="https://www.appcast.io/privacy-policy/" target="_blank">Appcast</a>, <a target="_blank" href="https://about.ads.microsoft.com/en-us/resources/policies/microsoft-advertising-privacy-policy">Microsoft Advertising</a>, <a href="https://www.reddit.com/policies/privacy-policy?rdt=64219" target="_blank">Reddit</a>, <a target="_blank" href="https://www.linkedin.com/legal/cookie-policy">LinkedIn Insights</a> and <a href="https://policies.google.com/technologies/ads?hl=en-US" target="_blank">Google Ads</a>.</p></div></div></div></div><div class="cookies__settings__buttons"><a class="cookiesButton cookiesButtonSave" role="button" href="#">Save and Close</a></div></div></div></div><div id="session-popup-root"></div><noscript data-cookie-type="1"><iframe src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-5GXRF8" height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden" data-cookie-type="1"></iframe></noscript>
